content.detailedDescription: N/a
content.summary: It was out of no where no noise found, it was above my house for a munit

content.detailedDescription: Round ball ultraviolet light ., i mean ultraviolet with alternating round pointed lengths of ultraviolet pointers all around the ultraviolet ball.
content.summary: Ultraviolet round pointed star shap solid ultraviolet color, solid ultraviolet !

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside, around 10:12 pm, when it began to rain heavily. i walked out from my front porch and looked to the sky northeast of my location, when i saw a large group of star-like lights in a diagonal pattern, randomly begin blinking for approximately ten seconds. i went inside to get my gortex top and bottom on and when i returned, they were gone. i've seen many strange light phenomenon in several different places, mainly in the southern california desert, but nothing like this before. a very mysterious and unique situation for sure.
content.summary: Right as a heavy rain began, i witness about 15-20 lights flashing on and off in a diagonal pattern very high in the sky to the northeast.

content.detailedDescription:
After leaving a nearby house and walking to my car, i immediately noticed what appeared to be at least 6 red orbs towards the south east. i immediately pointed them out to the people accompanying me and they too saw the lights. i first thought it was a series of cellphone towers in the distance as the brightest lights appeared to be ordered in a series of 3 vertical rows, each paralel to another; the video of the april 28 san diego mistaken ufo sighting came to my mind. the lights were star-like and the brightest approached jupiter-like magnitude. then i realized that the lights could not be a tower as they went to high up from the horizon and they were slowly moving. some orbs moved up, others moved down and some stayed fairly stationary. at one moment, one orb began to accelerate fairly quickly downwards and it made a triangular from with the two closest orbs. i began to think of what else it could be, but the absence of any beacon, strobe or green lights meant these were not aircraft of some sort. the orbs that did move did so in a smooth manner and didn't show any sort of organized stucture in respect to the other orbs (aside form the triangle). the 2 other people i was with were intrigued and quite excited to see the lights and neither they nor i could come up with an explanation of what we were seeing. after 3-4 minutes the orbs began to fade, almost as if they were moving away from us and heading into the far away clouds. they all dissappeared one by one until one was left; the brightest one, moving upwards from near treetop hight and slowly getting fainter. seeing that the event was nearly over, we got in the car and left for home.
 
the only logical explination we could make in the car was that the lights were chinese ballons, yet the orbs did not move with the easterly winds at that time and they stayed fairly stationary.
content.summary: Series of orbs hovering and slowly changing direction then fading away.

content.detailedDescription: Apeared in sky ,hoverd about 5 seconds then took off to the west.
content.summary: Hovered in sky then for 10 seconds then went west extrmely fast.

content.detailedDescription: We were outside at home sitting around a campfire. it was 10:30, the sky was clear, calm and quiet. i was facing south and noticed a bright orange light traveling west. i pointed it out to the rest of my family. all stood up and watched it travel across the sky apparently changing direction towards the south west until we lost it behind trees. we noticed no noise. it appeared to be flying at an altitude of roughly 500 to 1000 feet. it had no red or green marker lights or strobes standard on conventional aircraft. from our location we heard no engine or motor sound. the object was much brighter than venus and larger as well.
content.summary: Bright yellow orange object, changing in brightness, south of our location, flying west, then appearing to change direction towards the south west.

content.detailedDescription:
We were camping in our motorhome on completely secluded blm land just north of kingman, arizona. it was about 10:30 p.M. and we had our satellite dish up and was watching television. suddenly we heard an extremely loud, but low-pitched humming sound above the rv and felt a vibrating/rumbling sensation that felt as though it was coming up from the ground right through the rv.

we turned off the television and led lights and then my husband peaked out through the mini blinds and called out, "what the heck is that?" i jumped out of my chair to take a look and noticed an object that can only be described as a huge, bright white orb hovering above us, just off to the starboard side of the rv.  it was dead still, just hovering, only now it was completely silent which really gave us the creeps.

after all, as we discussed between us, what kind of aircraft can hover quietly in one spot, with no sound or movement. as far as we were concerned that ruled out a helicopter (only object we know that hovers)and any regular aircraft since we don't know of any that can hover in silence and stillness for any length of time, especially one that looked like a bright, round orb. in fact, it was so quiet, that if it hadn't been for the initial loud humming and vibration, we wouldn't have known it was there since all our blinds and curtains were closed.

we wondered how it could have spotted us out in the middle of nowhere in the pitch black of night, not to mention, being hidden behind some   desert shrubs. that made us feel uneasy. we even considered whether it tracked us from our satellite dish.  

oddly, we were relatively calm, under the circumstances. my husband got brave and went outside and looked directly up at the object but it still didn't move.  then, a strange thing happened. my husband came back into the rv, grabbed our huge, mega watt, high-beam flashlight, went back outside and shone it right up at the object and the object literally vanished right before our eyes! we didn't see it fly off in any direction.  it just vanished!  that was when we knew it had to be some kind of ufo. 

we were left stunned and in disbelief as to how that object could have just vanished into thin air without a trace.  we were relieved that it was gone and joked about it after.  my husband likes to think he scared it off with his flashlight!
content.summary: camping in motorhome when aware of a vibration and loud humming sound, observed a huge glowing white orb hovering above us.
content.locationName: Just north of Kingman, Ar, Arizona

content.detailedDescription: This event was observed by my cousin while we we're talking about this weird star in the sky
content.summary: There was a weird moon observed then this light started flashing and moving in weird patterns

content.detailedDescription:
In the first two weeks of august 2008, i took a trip to isla mujeres mexico with a close friend and her family. one night after we had gotten back from dinner, the family went to bed while my friend and went out onto the balcony to relax. the balcony had an amazing view of the caribbean water. it was approximately midnight to 1am when we noticed a weird light in the dark night sky. we both observed this object in the sky for at least five minutes which appeared odd and abnormally lower then most airplanes. it was clearly different then most aircrafts we had witnessed in the united states, where we were visiting from. the flying object was near the water but hovering over land some distance to our right. it's hard to say how high it was, at least 1-2 miles, or a little more.

the object was in the night sky and we could not make out the shape at first. it appeared almost as a triangle shape and each point of the triangle had shown a different color. the colors were either rotating at a rapid pace, or the object in the sky was spinning very fast making the colors appear as if they were rotating. they appeared as three different colors, red, yellow, and blue. we also thought it was strange that the colors were so random and not synchronized. the object was descending at a slow pace, which was obvious to us because the colors were getting clearer and the object became bigger as it lowered itself toward land. we never saw it land, or get within a mile of land due to the fear it created within us.

we became immediately frightened over the object and grew concerned, this is when we retreated back inside the condo. we went to bed scared, discussing what we saw, and knowing no one would believe us if we had told anyone this story of an unidentified object in the sky. its been 7 years and i will never forget the fear that came over us at the sighting. it made us feel small, and made us question ourselves.
content.summary: Night time triangle shaped object with bright colors rotating in sky

content.detailedDescription: I thought this object was a falling star it flashed in and out going in the same direction then change direction twice it was initially heading north came back south and then headed east and disappeared
content.summary: I thought the subject was a falling star went in and out in a sequential manner i watched it for about  a minute they traveled along then change distance and speed and direction

content.detailedDescription: 7/18/2015 the city of hiawtha is having fireworks but towards the other side of city 6 lights were going in the path and when we stopped to look at them they hooverd and went into the air we saw them for at least 30 seconds before they went up into the air.
content.summary: We saw 6 lights in a row then they stopped and went up into the sky

content.detailedDescription:
In back yard smoking cigarette. i happened to glance up and saw it. immediately knew it wasn't a plane helicopter or balloon. had no blinking lights. it moved at a slow constant speed then hesitated and began the previous rate of speed. it moved left to right and disappeared behind trees.  it was a distance from where we were watching.  difficult to know how far, but a good distance as the orb was very small.  no nervousness. both wife and i were calm.   sense of great urgency to get photos/video.  tried very hard to get in the house and get the iphone.  by the time i got back out my wife said it was behind the trees.  i was unable to get and photographic record.  txtd friend to txt another friend (police officer) to find out if there were any reports.  haven't heard back, but it's late and he might not have seen my message.  


don't know what else to say.
content.summary: In back yard observed glowing red/orange ball moving slowly across sky from left to right-steady speed fairly slow. disappeared behind trees before i could get my phone camera and get back outside.

content.detailedDescription:
On the 4th of july, 2015, i was at a firework celebration with several friends, and nearly half the city. me and some friends were watching the fireworks, when we noticed a strange object off in the distance. it was pretty far off the ground and was thought to be some type of drone, helicopter, or even a firework. it did not seem to be the case.

i over heard a few people saying "look at that!" and started to record. it had red and green lights switching back and forth. many people were looking at the object instead of the fireworks. it was very strange to see hovering. it wasn't a flare or a helicopter because it was a little visible from all the lights. it was a dark object but was in the shape of a sphere. it made no noise, just an ominous hover. after watching the object for at least ten minutes, it started to move south east, and vanished from sight. 

the friend i was with has had encounters with these type of strange events in the past, and is also a pilot for fedex, and has had strange encounters. it did not appear to be any type of civilian drone, aircraft or helicopter due to no noise. 

in the surrounding area, including olive branch, ms, this strange event was witnessed and video taped by people in other areas.
content.summary: Red and green lights. object hovered and slowly vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving with a friend, along the m5 in sw england (travelling northwards) and near to the town of taunton. the time was approx 3.30am (friday), the sky is clear & dimly starlit and we were heading to our hometown of newbury, berkshire.

all of the sudden a large aircraft appeared, rising over the bank to the left hand side of the motorway. it appeared to be launching & aligned itself with the motorway and proceeded to pass directly overhead of our vehicle. the motorway itself was very quiet of any other traffic. i slowed, as we watched in disbelief, for above us sat this very large, rectangular craft which was distinguishable by the many round white lights (of differing sizes) to its underbelly. due to the time of day, it was not possible to see specific colourings of the craft itself but we both knew that we had never seen the like of this anywhere before.

i pulled over to the side of the road for a moment and we stood by the car for a while, just watching. there was no audible 'engine' sound emiting from this craft. it progressed in a straight linefor upto approx 40 miles (i estimated this to be around the bristol area and roughly in line with the m4 (running eastwards towards london). here, it appeared to stop & hover momentarily before progressing eastwards, without physically turning. what was also remarkable about this was the exceedingly rapid acceleration in speed and ascending projectory that it then took.

my friend & i were back in the car and speechless, still watching as the craft sped off into the distance and space itself, before disappearing from our sight.

we couldn't explain what we had seen but knew that it was not an aircraft of this world. yet have never reported the sighting anywhere until today, for fear of ridicule and the liklihood of not being believed at the time (particularly as neither of us had the means for photographic evidence at the time). it is, however, an experience which i carry with me as clearly as if it happened yesterday and is how i know that we are not alone in this universe. i believe it is important to record this event, particularly given that this craft was neither spherical, saucer or cigar shaped (as many reported ufo sightings appear to be).
content.summary: Driving with friend on m5 (northbound). large craft appeared over bank to left. flew overhead for several miles. changed direction without turning. gained speed & altitude incredibly quickly, eventually disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
After the sighting of the last boomerang object i witnessed in early june, i have been keeping an eye out and finally was able to get a picture of the event happening near my house. around 10:30 at night on the 16th i was heading to the kroger on getwell and goodman. i was at the bend on pleasant hill and church road when i spotted a bright white light off in the distance. once again, after closely looking, it was a boomerang object, with 5 lights. one in the center, and 4 on the sides making it a boomerang. naturally, this ufo is in the flight path of memphis international airport. after observing it for two minutes, it was just hovering. there were no blinking strobes or colored lights like a plane or helicopter. it stayed stationary for five minutes. 

in the media section of this report, i drew a diagram of my position and the ufo's. also, i snapped a photo of it.

the object, after observation for a few minutes, slowly started to climb into the sky, and lights completely shut off, without a sound.

after speaking with fellow friends, the conclusion is, there are a lot of events such as these happening in the area.
content.summary: Boomerang object appeared. hovered for a few minutes then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my pool vacuuming the pool. facing west, i just happened to look up and i notice a black ball floating along at treetop level very slow,going south. it was just across the street from my property,about 150 maybe 200 feet away. i first thought must be a drone, but as i watched it i notice it's not making any sound. and for it to be as big as it is, about 4 to 5 foot round, i should be able to hear the prop wash if there is any. i was shocked i just could not stop looking at it. i didn't want to take my eyes off of it. and i fallowed it with my eyes as it floated un wavering, steady, straight line path, same altitude until compleatly out of site. at least a mile or more away.
content.summary: I was in my pool vacuuming the pool, i looked up and see a black ball floating  at tree level.

content.detailedDescription:
Live in rural sask on a farm, have seem orbs 4 times but never this close. we will often go enjoy the stars on a dark night, my nephew and wife were visiting from montreal and he had not been on the farm for years and wanted to see the sky! we are remote and the stars can be observed like no other place on earth, the flat prairies.
 my nephew is a pilot and he has seem them before but never this close. it seem to approach us, i made the comment if i had my shotgun i could of dropped it out of the sky it was that close!
after observing it and talking to it for a few minutes as it hovered we decided to walk closer to it, it was about 25 feet away, maybe 50 feet up.
 as we approached it it took off straight up for several hundred feet sanged direction straight south, watched until out of site.My nephew believes it a us military communication/observing device. at least that what they told him when he spent time on military bases in africa as a flight mechanic.
 another time i watched one just move at maybe 5 miles/hour over the cropline, so just 5 feet up for about a half mile.
  a third time about 10 years ago again late at night out to see the sky with my uncle,it was hovered straight east, it was like a large white eye opened and stayed open for many minutes, the same way it it became bright like and eye closing it went dark slowly.
 a fourth time, my brother and i watched one flying at about 20 miles/hour over the tree line going straight west,the size of a volleyball we guessed,only 100 feet south of us, we tried to get in a vehicle and go out of the yard to find it,we lost it.
 im on a remote farm, mearest neighbours are one mile away.
  anyways that's the truth! all of it!
content.summary: Dropped straight down, then moved horizontal, stopped above us above treeline, hovered, we walked towards it and it took off staright up then south out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting watching television when i saw in my peripheral vision extrodinarily bright lights in the sky traveling in southwesterly direction.Red,blue and green very large in size. the lights stayed on course until they reached ridgeline of the hanging hills in meriden ct. at that time they moved horizontally across top of mountain. they then ascended for short time,then came back down and appeared to be looking for something.After 22 minutes they decsended below ridgeline and were gone from sight. this type of craft appeared three times. jan. 16, 2014, june 20,2014, and app. june 20,2015. each time being in plain view for at least twenty minutes. also, extremely bright white orbs of light appeared over mountain and seemed to be searching among the trees. there were three of these, posssibly four.They also ascended above tree line, and were moving about in a "dancing" motion. the last unknown object that we saw in the sky was a bright gold orb below cloud level. it also hovered for about 8 to 10 minutes, increased in brilliance then swiftly acsended to the stars and was gone.
content.summary: Observed lights traveling swest. they hovered over the hanging hills, ascended, decended and and flew horizontally over ridgeline as though looking for something before decsending below ridgeline and disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Too bright glowing objects in the sky
content.summary: Was in logansport indiana getting ready to walk in walmart took a picture of the sky to show my mom didn't notice the objects to the next day

content.detailedDescription: Cilíndrico, girando lentamente no céu, em altura maior do que um avião comercial, provavelmente muito grande.
content.summary: Cilíndrico, girando lentamente no céu, em altura maior do que um avião comercial, provavelmente muito grande.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and a friend were sitting on the back patio at his house late one night. we both then noticed a giant, red/orange, glowing ball in the sky. the distance is unknown, but an estimate would be one or two miles away. the object came straight from the ground directly up, about halfway up the horizon. even if it was very close to us, it was 10 times faster than an airplane. it stopped and accelerated rapidly and stood still when it stopped, basically hovering. it flew in a very dinstinct "square" pattern, stopping for a few moments at each "corner" of the square. 

rose from the ground, and that position would be the top left corner of the square. it proceeded clockwise, stopping at 4 equidistant points, the last being it's original starting position (not including the ground it took off from). it stood still at that last spot about twice as long as the others, before ascending at a 45° angle until it disappeared. 

very fast, stop/start capabilities, very big, distinct pattern before takeoff. 

it seemed that the object was performing a normal or routine pattern it needed in order to ascend out of sight. my associate and i had never seen anything like it. with the fact that it went into space and out of sight, there is no doubt it's purpose was to leave earth.
content.summary: Giant red orb, perfect square flight path, ascent up and out

content.detailedDescription:
On of about november 1965, on or about 3 a. m. travis afb alert area sac 10 b-52 bombers on alert status each has nuclear weapons on board.  area protected by 20 air force security policemen.  plus a ncoic, and strike team with three security police with fully automatic weapons, and k-9 units in the fields.

i as a airman security policeman on a remote portion of the alert area observed observed orange globes ascending from near the active runway and my position with the b-52 i was guarding.  this event lasted approx 10 minutes the first time.  i radioed for help and ncoc and strike team responded, a detailed search was conducted and nothing was observed or found.   about 4 a.M. i observed the globes again.

i radioed the alert again,  this time all available security police (sac) responded including the reserve strike team called out.

a lengthy search was conducted and the control tower reported an aircraft that was taking off, almost flew into such a globe.    negative on the search, it never happened again.   in august 1966 i was reassigned to torrejon ab, spain,  just after they lost the nuke in the med from a crashed b-52.

after discharged, i was employed by the united states marshal's service, and i am the founder of the fraternal order of law enforcement.

i have produced a youtube video on this event.
content.summary: Orange globes moving from ground level into the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Photo #1 . . .  actual photo taken of sighting area when many fires were burning throughout the san diego, california area may 14, 2014.  several of them could be seen from my home.
the following seven photos were taken a few months later (at the same time of day), after feeling compelled to document what i witnessed that day around 1pm. i feel it would take too long to describe the details, so i have pasted white pieces of paper to the photos to show what i saw.  the photos are in order and numbered. besides this written account, descriptions are pasted on reverse of each photo.     

photo #2 . . . a friend and i were looking at smoke from four of those fires when i spotted what looked like, at first, a balloon.  for about 10 seconds i watched as it bobbed up, down and around in an area beyond the nearby mobile home roofs, on the other side of a couple housing developments, and past a stand of trees near a golf course about 2 miles away.  my companion soon spotted the object.  if my friend wishes to make a report of this sighting that remains to be seen.

photo #3 . . . .  after observing this object bobbing and weaving, i noticed it ascending and coming to a stop.  i thought it may be a balloon of sorts i am not familiar with and it was probably tethered.  it hovered motionless while i was wishing i was closer to get a better look.  within two seconds i could tell it was on the move, straight for us.  i thought for sure as it approached we would begin to recognize the object and soon hear it.

photo #4 . . . it was getting closer, but i still did not know what it was.  a radiantly brilliant pure white object.  i wondered what it was made of, for the sun to reflect off of it without sending a reflection back. it appeared to be perfectly round.  was it round or flat?  no sound approaching.  

photo #5 . . . in the 3 seconds it took to reach us, it was obvious the object was not tethered.  nothing was pushing or pulling the craft.   i could not see any means of propulsion or guidance.  no wings, flaps or aerials.  no insignias or markings of any kind. no windows.  no pulsing lights.

photo #6 . . .  turning on my heels, i watched it go past us.  the photo shows where it stopped and remained for about 5 seconds.  without a point of reference, it’s hard to know precisely how high it was.  it seems it had not gained much altitude from the time it left the trees, so my guess is around 1,000 feet, but possibly less.  i still could not hear a motor or even a whirring sound, just silence. i also had not seen any change in the structure; still just perfectly round and very bright white, as though a light were coming from inside to illuminate the exterior.  although the sun was now behind the object, it remained just as luminous as when i thought possibly the sun had possibly been reflecting on it to make it so radiant.  it’s hard to know if the object was round like a ball or flat, as it  looked the same throughout this sighting.

photo #7 . . .  the object moved slightly to our right.  i was thinking it seemed to be curious about us.  i was thinking maybe it was going to come closer.  i was also thinking “are you crazy?”  it hung there for about 4 seconds then disappeared.  just blinked out.  my friend asked if i had seen what they had seen.  we discussed the options of what it could have been, concluding we had witnessed an object flying in the sky that we could
not identify.
content.summary: Bright ball-like sphere approached, hovered, then blinked out.

content.detailedDescription: June 26th 2015 at approx. 10 pm. observed outside my home an orange orb travelling silently at approx. 1000 ft. i say this because we have a nearby airport and small planes arrive to land daily. we had just returned from of all places, a couple of lectures at the alien cosmos expo and decided to have a drink on the side deck. i was the second witness, the first witness's "deer in the head lights" stare caused me to turn and look. it was round and translucent . the edges did not look solid. we had not seen anything like it before. i thought it may have been the back end of a military plane out on maneuvers but couldn't figure why that would be the only light on. it appeared to travel very quickly (compared to a cessna) and in a straight path. because we are surrounded by other houses and trees, our line of sight disappeared quickly.
content.summary: Observed orange orb moving in a westerly direction, silently, at night.

content.detailedDescription: Filmed orbs appearing pulsating several skeptics wooo in video
content.summary: Orbs of light shifting

content.detailedDescription: Ball of fire. took picture and nothing showed up! there 6 people 3 or 4 next door.I knew that itdid not come from here! i thought it was the coolest thing i have ever seen!!!!!
content.summary: Moved slowly east for about 5miles then started to go north and up,then vanished

content.detailedDescription: While sky watching from camelsback park i witnessed a small, circular, white object move extremely fast across the sky from the ne to ssw in about 6 seconds. craft was above the cloud line but of unknown altitude. object moved from one section of the sky to the other too quickly to be a satellite, but considerably slower than a meteor and left no trail. no noticeable noise was associated with its movement.
content.summary: Small, fast moving object seen over boise.

content.detailedDescription: i was going to pick my son up from work, that's why i knew the exact time.  was driving south on 933 almost to the corner of chippawa right by the church there when i saw the object.  i pulled into their parking lot to watch it and it got smaller then disappeared from view after only a couple min. i am into ufology and was looking at the sky for fun as i went up 933, thinking it would be neat to see a ufo, but did not actually expect to see anything.  when i first saw it the ufo just seemed to fade in!  it was a few inches long at the distance i was viewing it from (estimate about a mile) and it was very bright, intensity was near half the intensity of the sun.  someone else had to see it.  i pulled into the church lot at this point to watch it.  from my perspective it seemed to travel wnw while gaining altitude till it hit the cloud deck and faded from view.  by the time it hit the clouds it looked much smaller and dimmer.  my son (who was at work and did not see it) said i saw a plane reflecting the sun, but to me the flight path and size rule this out.  while i am not a trained observer we have lived here for over 30 years and i am very familiar with aircraft in general.  i am familiar with many objects in the sky that commonly get filmed or photographed as ufo's but are in-fact explainable as bolide meteors, ball lightning and yes, even missidentified aircraft.  i am even familiar with many different plasma effects that even now science is still trying to puzzle out (norway has some good research in this area).  i am confident this was not any of those.
content.summary: Driving south on 933, saw this long cigar shaped object in the sky either intensely reflecting the sun or glowing or brightly lit.  either way it was bright and not to high in the sky, someone else had to have seen it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in chicago for the 'fare thee well' event (the last grateful dead concerts). in the afternoon i mentioned to a new friend how i would love to see some orb lights, as has happened at other events. i also mentioned that when these anomalies occurred, i would observe only some attendees in the crowd witness along with me, while many others did not seem to notice...
ok, fine. at around dusk, my new friend and i were in the south parking lot listening to the music with a smattering of other fans who also did not get into the show. he and i saw an orange light rise over the arena and i said that it could be an orb, or simply a chinese lantern, but if it exhibited strange behavior like changes in apparent size or direction, or was joined by others to make ubiquitous triangle shapes, etc: then we have something to work with!...
the light moved west a little and faded out, and was followed by a pair of orange lights which appeared to rise either from the venue itself or from further north, passing over. these two 'objects' also drifted west a short distance before vanishing. i said i wasn't confident to make a determination but that if they reappear, well, you get the idea.
 they did not reappear, and we began to converse with the folks standing next to us. it was strange because even though we were all looking in the same direction (north), they did not see any phenomena over the coliseum! that being said,the one girl closest to me was confident that it was chinese lanterns. "wait" i said, "you saw chinese lanterns?!?"... "no, you did", she replied. 
 "hold on, what did you see?" i asked her boyfriend... "i didn't see anything", he said. 
"so, we're all standing here, looking there (pointing to the arena) and nobody else saw anything?"... 
"you're telling me that you didn't see anything up there, but you know what i saw?"... 
"yes", she said confidently. i turned back to my friend, "see what i mean?"
 -so that's that. 
it was not as amazing as other sightings i've had, yet strange nonetheless.
content.summary: 3 "chinese sky lanterns" over soldier field stadium

content.detailedDescription:
It was evening and i was at a friends house when we stepped outside for a smoke. 

i didn't write down the exact date but it was in 1998 or 1999. i remember it was a little chilly outside but not yet fall. evenings can be chilly up here even in july or august so it had to be around that time of the year. 

we were just standing there talking and looking up at the sky when we witnessed something very odd high up in the sky. 

none of us said a word to each other we were too awestruck at what we were looking at. i might add that none of us believed in ufos or aliens and had we not seen what we saw with our own eyes none of us would have believed it. 

what we saw was a gigantic craft of triangular shape and it appeared as black as night without any reflection or shine on the surface. it had three bright red lights on each corner on the triangular shape. i remember them as pulsating but not very rapidly.

it was just sitting up there in the sky perfectly still and without making any sound. then suddenly it flew in a straight line to one direction, then the opposite and up and down with such incredible speed  that no known aircraft would possibly be able to do. in just one blink of an eye it traveled from a far distance just underneath the clouds to a position through the clouds a distance that would take a commercial airplane at least 30 seconds of reaching. it was like they were showing off or something having fun up there and wanting to be seen. 

it went on like that for few minutes snd then it just took off straight into the sky and was gone in the blink of an eye. 

considering the altitude of the craft it had to be gigantic because of how much of it was detectable from the ground maybe hundreds of kilometers away. that moment changed my life and how i look at the world we live in. i've been absolutely fascinated by ufos and alien encounters ever since. this is the first time i'm speaking out about what we saw because i didn't think anyone would be interested in it.
content.summary: It appeared to be what is now called a tr 3
